name: Darkness Dark
description:
Welcome to our dark world where all-encompassing darkness also reaches you. Control one of the Shadows as he tries to plague the city in darkness. Try to avoid the light and reach the finish line with as many points as possible. Remember, you can walk on the floor as well as on the wall in front of the camera. A game invented and made in less than 3 days. Creators: Team Hamlet Comming Soon

Game is a submission for ZenoJam 4. 

Theme: I AM EVERYWHERE
